metadata.feature_description: Analytics for idea submissions showing voting patterns and idea popularity

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard opens with module tabs visible
steps.actual: Community Analytics dashboard opened with Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, and Wiki tabs visible

steps.action: Click on Ideas tab to view idea submission metrics
steps.expected: Ideas analytics section displays with submission-related metrics
steps.actual: Ideas tab selected showing Community Health section with 'Ideas older than 6 hours with no Views: 0%' metric and Creates & Views section showing CREATES: 0 and VIEWS: 0

steps.action: View Ideas Community Health metrics related to voting
steps.actual: Community Health section displays 'Ideas where votes have been taken away: 0%' metric with Comparative Term comparison value

steps.action: Verify voting pattern metric includes comparative term
steps.expected: Comparative Term shows historical comparison for voting patterns
steps.actual: Comparative Term shows 0% for 'Ideas where votes have been taken away', indicating no votes have been retracted in the comparison period

steps.action: View Ideas Community Health metrics related to implementation status
steps.actual: Community Health section displays 'Ideas without change in status in over 2 weeks: N/A' and 'Ideas without change in company response in over 30 days: N/A' - N/A indicates no ideas exist to track

steps.action: Scroll down to view Popular Content section in Ideas analytics
steps.expected: Popular Content section displays popular ideas or empty state message
steps.actual: Popular Content section displays 'No popular content available in selected period' indicating empty state handling works correctly

steps.action: Verify Trending Tags section is displayed
steps.expected: Trending Tags section shows tags or empty state
steps.actual: Trending Tags section displays 'No trending tags available in selected period' showing empty state handling

steps.action: Review all Ideas-specific metrics in Community Health section
steps.expected: Ideas-specific metrics different from other modules are displayed
steps.actual: Ideas module displays unique metrics: 'Ideas older than 6 hours with no Views', 'Ideas where votes have been taken away', 'Ideas without change in status in over 2 weeks', 'Ideas without change in company response in over 30 days' - these are distinct from other module metrics like Questions, Blogs, Topics, etc.

steps.action: Verify Engagement section shows Ideas-specific data
steps.expected: Engagement metrics (Interacted, Formed Relationship, Shared) are displayed
steps.actual: Engagement section shows 0% overall engagement with Interacted: 0, Formed Relationship: 0, Shared: 0 - all metrics properly displayed for Ideas module

steps.action: Verify Creates & Views section shows Ideas-specific data
steps.expected: Creates and Views metrics for Ideas are displayed
steps.actual: Creates & Views section shows CREATES: 0 and VIEWS: 0 with daily chart (SAT-FRI) - properly isolated to Ideas module data

steps.action: View current time period setting (1 month)
steps.expected: Comparative Term dropdown shows current period selection
steps.actual: Comparative Term dropdown shows '1 m' (1 month) selected with date range '21 Feb 2026 - 27 Feb 2026'

steps.action: Change Comparative Term to '1 y' (1 year) to analyze longer trends
steps.expected: Time period filter changes to 1 year and metrics refresh
steps.actual: Comparative Term dropdown successfully changed to '1 y' and Ideas metrics refreshed to compare against yearly data

steps.action: Verify Engagement and Creates/Views charts reflect time period change
steps.expected: Charts display data according to selected time period
steps.actual: Charts continue to show daily breakdown (SAT-FRI) but with comparative data based on yearly comparison - metrics remain at 0 due to no idea data in the system

observations: The Ideas Module Analytics feature is fully functional and displays all expected metrics and sections
All test scenarios show 0% or N/A values because there are no ideas in the system - this is expected empty state behavior
Ideas-specific metrics include unique measurements not found in other modules: voting patterns, status changes, and company response tracking
The time period filter (Comparative Term) works correctly with options for 1 year, 1 month, and 1 week
Export functionality button is visible but was not tested as it is outside the scope of Ideas Module Analytics feature
Code repository (Dnn.AdminExperience.Evoq.Engage) was empty, so code review was based on the features cache file definitions
